affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 表示"…的"

word_group.brief_definition: 最慷慨的贡献者；最慷慨的捐助者；最大方的贡献者

bilingual.source: Carl and his friends stayed with a generous family.
bilingual.target: 卡尔和他的朋友们住在一个慷慨的家庭。

bilingual.source: "He says, if you do something really kind and generous, you'll be able to fly like other dragons."
bilingual.target: “他说，如果你做一些非常善良和慷慨的事情，你就能像其他龙一样飞翔。”
给予血液是一种慷慨的行为。

bilingual.source: He treats everyone with a generous heart.
bilingual.target: 他以慷慨的心态对待所有人。

bilingual.source: He made a generous donation to the charity.
bilingual.target: 他向慈善机构做了一个慷慨的捐赠。

bilingual.source: She made a generous contribution to the charity.
bilingual.target: 她对慈善事业做出了慷慨的贡献。

bilingual.source: The donations amounted to a generous contribution.
bilingual.target: 捐款总计是一笔慷慨的捐赠。

bilingual.source: The project succeeded thanks to a generous backer.
bilingual.target: 这个项目因为一个慷慨的支持者而成功。

bilingual.source: The event was a success thanks to the generous sbo.
bilingual.target: 由于慷慨的赞助商，活动取得了成功。

bilingual.source: The hospital was built thanks to a generous benefactor.
bilingual.target: 医院的建成要感谢一位慷慨的捐助者。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, how generous. You really did play together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，真仗义啊。你们俩以前真的是搭档啊。

yingyinNormal.en: New York has been blessed with generous civic spaces.
yingyinNormal.zh: 纽约得天独厚，拥有大量城市空间。

yingyinNormal.en: This is so generous of you, I don't know what to say.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们真是太慷慨了，我…我都不知道说什么了。

yingyinNormal.en: You'll look generous, I'll get to train, we both win. Deal?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可以树立大度的形象，我可以训练，我们各取所需，可以吗？

yingyinNormal.en: My name is Leonard, but my friends call me Chuckles. Very generous! Thank...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的名字叫伦纳德，朋友们管我叫呵呵笑。出手真是大方，谢谢…

yingyinNormal.en: But then once I got to know him, I saw that he's really sweet and caring and very generous.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但了解他之后，我就发现他很贴心，很大方。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, this is very generous. And we don't want any recognition. This is completely anonymous.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们真大方 我们不留名．匿名捐助，完全匿名。

yingyinNormal.en: Phoebe, you are so beautiful. You're so kind. You're so generous. You're so wonderfully weird.
yingyinNormal.zh: 菲比, 你是这么的美丽这么的善良，这么的大方。古怪的你是那么的迷人。

yingyinNormal.en: You must know. Surely you must know it was all for you. You are too generous to trifle with me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你必须知道 你一定要知道，这一切都是为了你所做的。你是个爽快的人，绝不会开我的玩笑。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, Penny. I know you think you're being generous, but the foundation of gift-giving is reciprocity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，佩妮，我知道你认为自己很大方，但送礼是建立在互利互惠的原则上的。

yingyinNormal.en: You're strong. Me. You're generous. Me. But I never taught you to lie. That's why you're so bad at it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你很强壮。这是我教的。你很慷慨。这是我教的。但我可没教过你撒谎。所以你很不擅长。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Tribbiani. Oh hi. Your generous contribution brings us a big step closer to building the youth center.
yingyinNormal.zh: 崔比亚尼先生，你的慷慨解囊，让兴建活动中心的事大有进展。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm washing dishes. Well, I was on the turkey line, but I got demoted for being too generous with the gravy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我来刷盘子啊，我本来是分火鸡的，但因为肉汁给太多，被下放来刷盘子了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh,my God, that's so generous! It's the least we can do. I really appreciate it. Can you hold on one second?
yingyinNormal.zh: 天啊，你们真是太大方了。小事一件不足挂齿。我真的很感谢。你能稍微等我一下吗？

yingyinNormal.en: What a perfect way to get caught up. Meeting with the smartest kids in school. What a generous offer, Taylor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这真是认识大家的好方法呀，和校园中最聪明的一群人聚会。你的提议真是慷慨，泰勒。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a rare opportunity for them. She's very generous. But I wondered, what are we to do about the kitchen staff?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这对他们很难得 ，夫人真慷慨，但不知道厨房的佣人们怎么办呢？

yingyinNormal.en: I can't tear them away from that Atari. Thank you. Yeah. I'll give my boys another five. I'm feeling generous today. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 孩子们玩那台游戏机玩上瘾了。谢谢你。我再给他们五分钟。我今天很慷慨。好吧。

yingyinNormal.en: I've come to collect your things for the jumble sale. Here they are. Thank you. And would you like this old chair? Oh, most generous. Good-bye. Bye bye.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是来这里拿你们准备义卖的东西的。都在这了。谢谢你了。这把旧椅子你需要吗？你们实在太慷慨了，再见。再见。

yingyinNormal.en: I need you to find out if Ruchi's trying to steal my projects at work while I'm on bed rest. She's not that kind of a person. She's generous and charitable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要你查出如琪是否想趁我卧床休养时抢走我的研究项目。她不是那种人。她慷慨大方乐善好施。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, how do you think we're doing so far? At parenting? I... 'Cause I think we're at a six. On a sliding scale, one through ten, I think we're at a six and I think I'm being generous.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你觉得我们目前为止做得怎么样？当父母这方面？我……我觉得我们也就六分。平心而论，从一到十我觉得打六分都算很大方了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 慷慨地；宽大地；丰盛地

word_family.mean: adj. 慷慨的；大方的；丰盛的；善意的；量多的

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) showing a readiness to give more money than is strictly necessary or expected

examination_example.sentence: an urge to be <highlight>generous</highlight> to the claimants
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对索赔人慷慨解囊的冲动

examination_example.sentence: You don't skip down to the jobcentre with a song in your heart, delighted at the prospect of doubling your income from the <highlight>generous</highlight> state.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你不可能心里哼着歌，蹦蹦跳跳地去就业中心，满心喜悦地期望慷慨的国家会让你收入翻倍。

examination_example.sentence: Instead, the claimant receives a time-limited “allowance,” conditional on actively seeking a job; at ￡71.70 a week, one of the least <highlight>generous</highlight> in the EU.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，申请人只能得到限时的"津贴"，前提是积极找工作：每周 71.70 英镑，这是欧盟最低的补贴之一。

examination_example.sentence: Politicians have repeatedly "backloaded" public-sector pay deals, keeping the pay increases modest but adding to holidays and especially pensions that are already <highlight>generous</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 政客们一再“变相提高”公共部门的待遇--保持工资低涨幅，但是增加假期，尤其是增加原本就很丰厚的养老金。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 表示"…的"

word_usage.usage:
be generous with sth. 意为“在……方面很慷慨”，如：
to be generous with your time  不吝惜时间
She’s quite generous with her praise.
她很喜欢赞扬别人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 慷慨；大方；丰富；大量
adv. 慷慨地；宽大地；丰盛地

word_family.mean: adj. 慷慨的；大方的；丰盛的；善意的；量多的

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) showing a readiness to give more money than is strictly necessary or expected

examination_example.sentence: I'm talking about those who consistently believe they deserve special treatment and <highlight>generous</highlight> rewards.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我说的是那些始终认为自己应该得到特殊待遇和丰厚奖励的人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) showing a readiness to give more money than is strictly necessary or expected

examination_example.sentence: It's an amazing accomplishment and one we cannot achieve without <highlight>generous</highlight> support from individuals, corporations, and other social organizations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一项惊人的成就，如果没有个人、公司和其他社会组织的慷慨支持，我们就不可能实现这一成就。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。
